keyMoments.title: Energy Steroid Usage in Battle
keyMoments.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates demonstrate their reliance on Energy Steroids when Hody's subordinate gives him a pill to recover from Zoro's attack.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's dependence on artificial power enhancement to achieve their goals.

keyMoments.title: Capture of Ryugu Palace
keyMoments.description: Led by Hody Jones, the New Fish-Man Pirates successfully capture King Neptune, Zoro, Usopp, and Brook, taking control of Ryugu Palace.
keyMoments.significance: Major victory for the crew that gives them control of Fish-Man Island's government.

bases.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates take control of Ryugu Palace by force

keyMoments.title: Three Members Captured
keyMoments.description: Zoro, Usopp, and Brook are captured by Hody Jones along with King Neptune at Ryugu Palace.
keyMoments.significance: First major setback for the crew in the Fish-Man Island arc, splitting them into captured and free members.

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Jinbe
keyMoments.description: Part of the crew reunites with Jinbe at the Sea Forest, strengthening their relationship and setting up his future recruitment.
keyMoments.significance: Important step in Jinbe's journey to eventually joining the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Learn About Jinbe and Arlong's Connection
keyMoments.description: The crew learns that Jinbe was indirectly responsible for Arlong's rampage in the East Blue when he released Arlong from Marine captivity.
keyMoments.significance: Connects the Fish-Man Island arc to the crew's past with Arlong and deepens their understanding of Jinbe's character.

ships.description: Currently being coated by Den at the Sea Forest to prepare for the New World journey

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
